name: CoroElideLegacyPass
description: Coroutine frame allocation elision and indirect calls replacement

name: CoroSplitLegacyPass
description: Split coroutine into a set of functions driving its state machine

name: DemoteRegisterToMemoryPass
description: Demote all values to stack slots

name: EntryExitInstrumenterPass
description: Instrument function entry/exit with calls to e.g. mcount()(pre inlining)

name: LoopGuardWideningPass
description: Widen guards (within a single loop, as a loop pass)

name: LowerAtomicPass
description: Lower atomic intrinsics to non-atomic form

name: LowerGuardIntrinsicPass
description: Lower the guard intrinsic to normal control flow

name: LowerInvokePass
description: Lower invoke and unwind, for unwindless code generators

name: LowerWidenableConditionPass
description: Lower the widenable condition to default true value

name: MergeICmpsLegacyPass
description: Merge contiguous icmps into a memcmp

name: ModuleSanitizerCoverageLegacyPassPass
description: Pass for instrumenting coverage on functions

name: NameAnonGlobalPass
description: Provide a name to nameless globals

name: PGOMemOPSizeOptLegacyPass
description: Optimize memory intrinsic using its size value profile

name: PartiallyInlineLibCallsPass
description: Partially inline calls to library functions

name: PostInlineEntryExitInstrumenterPass
description: Instrument function entry/exit with calls to e.g. mcount()" "(post inlining)

name: SeparateConstOffsetFromGEPPass
description: Split GEPs to a variadic base and a constant offset for better CSE

name: StripNonDebugSymbolsPass
description: Strip all symbols, except dbg symbols, from a module

name: StripSymbolsPass
description: Strip all symbols from a module
